title: Wear Cam
summary: Remote control your camera using your watch
description: ☆ What is Wear Cam?Wear Cam is an automatic handsfree multishot camera application that can take pictures remotely using you wearable watch. Perfect for those selfies and group pictures.☆ What functions / features does Wear Cam have?1. Automatic handsfree multishot camera.2. Remote control using your watch3. View the photo using your watch4. Autofocus.5. Silent Mode to take pictures without the camera making any sound.☆ What you can do with Wear Cam?Wear Cam allows you to take lots of pictures and videos of yourself from a distance without having to go back to the phone, by simply using your watch, the camera automatically takes the shot. Perfect for those selfies or couple pictures. The wear app will launch when you start the app on your phone. You can take a picture and view it from your watch remotely.It is also very useful for taking group pictures, as no one is excluded from the photographs, just by placing the camera at the desired distance and using your watch to control the camera and you have all the photos you want with friends and family.
descriptionHTML:
☆ What is Wear Cam?

Wear Cam is an automatic handsfree multishot camera application that can take pictures remotely using you wearable watch. Perfect for those selfies and group pictures.

☆ What functions / features does Wear Cam have?

1. Automatic handsfree multishot camera.
2. Remote control using your watch
3. View the photo using your watch
4. Autofocus.
5. Silent Mode to take pictures without the camera making any sound.


☆ What you can do with Wear Cam?

Wear Cam allows you to take lots of pictures and videos of yourself from a distance without having to go back to the phone, by simply using your watch, the camera automatically takes the shot. Perfect for those selfies or couple pictures. The wear app will launch when you start the app on your phone. You can take a picture and view it from your watch remotely.

It is also very useful for taking group pictures, as no one is excluded from the photographs, just by placing the camera at the desired distance and using your watch to control the camera and you have all the photos you want with friends and family.
comments: "Wear" is a reference to ANDROID WEAR devices. Samsung Gear watches use Tizen, and its apps are downloaded via the Samsung Apps store, or via the SamsungGear app for Android, NOT VIA GOOGLE PLAY STORE. As similar apps are also available there, those of you rating the ANDROID WEAR app badly because you're clueless should go try the software MADE FOR YOUR SAMSUNG DEVICE, and change your unfair rating of this one correspondingly. Your idiocy is mind-blowing. This s*** drives me nuts...
Need some bugfixes as Video capturing works but photo doesn't, and phone app used to launch on launching wear app but that to stopped after recent update.
It really works!! I'm really pleased.

Unable to use on my Gear s3 Classic. It does just fine as a camera on my phone, but I already have that. My watch isn't able to take the photos nor the videos. I've gone through the app settings all over and can't seem to understand how to configure the app to my watch.. kinda disappointing. Please help, I was looking forward to using this.
I can't download it to my watch? Not in wear store just goes to phone?
